title: please click on this
body:
I'm having difficulty finding my main, for 5-6 years I have been playing this game and you can tell I don't have a main yet because of my 527 total mastery score, I have SO much champs level 4 and higher and just can't find the perfect one. So please, if you have time please help me.
Im just jumping in here to get an idea how tondo this myself.
My biggest problem is I get of bored of champions really fast, but there is a lot of consistency of what I like to play.
- Mid-JG
- High burst
- High-Medium Mobility
- not boring (lmao) 
- likes to go for carries
- outplay potential
what champions have similar criterias?

also, champions I want to play are 
Taliyah, Akali, Fiddle, Fizz, and more

please HELP ME!!!{{sticker:cass-cry}}
